SELECT ROUND(SUM(cash), 2) AS cash, ROUND(SUM(memberBalance), 2) AS memberBalance, ROUND(SUM(unionpay), 2) AS unionpay, ROUND(SUM(alipay), 2) AS alipay, ROUND(SUM(wechatpay), 2) AS wechatpay, ROUND(SUM(creditpay), 2) AS creditpay, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN sysPaymentWayId = 1 THEN sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS shengyb, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN sysPaymentWayId = 2 THEN sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS shiyb, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN sysPaymentWayId = 3 THEN sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS dkq, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN sysPaymentWayId = 4 THEN sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS ybk, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN sysPaymentWayId = 5 THEN sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS bgflk, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN sysPaymentWayId = 6 THEN sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS yky, ROUND(SUM(actualAmount), 2) AS actualAmount, ROUND(SUM(disparityAmount), 2) AS disparityAmount, DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS creationDate, creatorId, creatorName, sysClinicName FROM view_nwt_payment_record
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(sysClinicName like '${sysClinicName}%' or sysClinicCode like '${sysClinicName}%') and
(creatorName like '${creatorName}%' or creatorCode like '${creatorName}%') and
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), sysClinicId
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), sysClinicId, creatorId
ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') desc, sysClinicId, creatorId

SELECT ROUND(SUM(b.cash), 2) AS cash, ROUND(SUM(b.memberBalance), 2) AS memberBalance, ROUND(SUM(b.unionpay), 2) AS unionpay, ROUND(SUM(b.alipay), 2) AS alipay, ROUND(SUM(b.wechatpay), 2) AS wechatpay, ROUND(SUM(creditpay), 2) AS creditpay, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN b.sysPaymentWayId = 1 THEN b.sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS shengyb, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN b.sysPaymentWayId = 2 THEN b.sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS shiyb, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN b.sysPaymentWayId = 3 THEN b.sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS dkq, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN b.sysPaymentWayId = 4 THEN b.sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS ybk, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN b.sysPaymentWayId = 5 THEN b.sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS bgflk, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN b.sysPaymentWayId = 6 THEN b.sysPaymentWayAmount ELSE 0 END), 2) AS yky, ROUND(SUM(b.actualAmount), 2) AS actualAmount, ROUND(SUM(b.disparityAmount), 2) AS disparityAmount, DATE_FORMAT(b.creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS creationDate, b.creatorId, b.creatorName, b.sysClinicName FROM ( SELECT * FROM mrm_deposit_record
(DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(sys_clinic_id = #{sysClinicId}) and
GROUP BY lsh ) a LEFT JOIN view_nwt_payment_record b ON a.lsh = b.lsh
(b.sysClinicName like '${sysClinicName}%' or sysClinicCode like '${sysClinicName}%') and
(b.creatorName like '${creatorName}%' or creatorCode like '${creatorName}%') and
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(b.creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), b.sysClinicId
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(b.creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), b.sysClinicId, b.creatorId
ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(b.creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') desc, b.sysClinicId, b.creatorId
